item.title: Pixel deckel fp1 mill
item.description:
This is a pixel take on the renowned deckel fp1 universal milling machine.

Part of my workshop series, where I piece by piece recreate my workshop in a little pixel world :)

item.title: Fully to scale map of the solar system by delta-v
item.description:
Click to expand

What is this image?

It is an accurate and to scale map of the solar system in both size and delta-v! It’s the delta-v from low earth’s orbit to the low orbit of the given celestial body.

item.title: Symmetree
item.description: I discovered a weird phenomena where if you look up at the sky through some bare branch trees, take a picture, and mirror it along the center - you can pretty much always find some sort of creepy religious figure. Like a bishop. Or an alien. I’ve never been religious but maybe this is that elusive generational trauma memory? lol
